name: 71 HOURS IN ECONOMY!  Flying on the World's Longest Flights Back to Back!
description:
What's it like flying on the world's longest flights within 24 hours of each other, in economy/coach class?  I took up this challenge and flew from the UK to New Zealand and back in three days!  Starting with Qantas inaugural nonstop flight from London to Perth, then coming back on Qatar Airways flight QR921 from Auckland to Doha on the world's longest flight.  How hard can it be?

CHECK OUT PRIORITY PASS FOR LOUNGE ACCESS - 10% DISCOUNT FOR MY VIEWERS: https://bit.ly/2BGDwOo (affiliate link)

FLIGHTS FEATURED
Qantas Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner (QF10) - London to Perth
Qantas Airbus A330-200 (QF568) - Perth to Sydney
Qantas Boeing 737-800 (QF141) - Sydney to Auckland
Qatar Airways Boeing 777-200LR - Auckland to Doha
Qatar Airways Airbus A380-800 - Doha to London
